quotes.message: Bloom where you're planted.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Curiosity killed the cat.
quotes.name: E. O'Neill

quotes.message: Don't bite off more than you can chew.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Even though you have ten thousand fields, you can eat but one measure of rice a day.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Every man has his price.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Gold is the devil's fishhook.
quotes.name: Italian

quotes.message: If passion drives, let reason hold the reins.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: If you don't want trouble, don't go looking for it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's better to find a whole worm in your apple than half a worm.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never pick up what you didn't put down.
quotes.name: Virgin Islander

quotes.message: Never trouble trouble 'til trouble troubles you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nor eye in a letter, nor hand in a purse, nor ear in the secret of another.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The crow may be caged but his thoughts are in the cornfield.
quotes.name: Belizean

quotes.message: The devil catches most souls in a golden net.
quotes.name: German

quotes.message: The devil tempts but doesn't force.
quotes.name: Guyanan

quotes.message: The grass is always greener in someone else's yard.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There is a charm about the forbidden that makes it unspeakably desirable.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The devil doesn't come dressed in a red cape and pointy horns. He comes as everything you've ever wished for.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: Temptation is the feeling we get when encountered by an opportunity to do what we innately know we shouldn't.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: The greatest temptations are not those that solicit our consent to obvious sin, but those that offer us great evils masking as the greatest goods.
quotes.name: Thomas Merton

quotes.message: Temptation is stronger in the minds of people who are in doubt. Prayer makes it weaker.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Sometimes we have to behave indifferent towards people who proclaim their love to us, just to see if they are really different.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Temptation likes best those who think they have a natural immunity, for it may laugh all the harder when they succumb.
quotes.name: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.message: Temptation is the fire that brings up the scum of the heart.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Every conquering temptation represents a new fund of moral energy. Every trial endured and weathered in the right spirit makes a soul nobler and stronger than it was before.
quotes.name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.message: Temptation is like a knife, that may either cut the meat or the throat of a man; it may be his food or his poison, his exercise or his destruction
quotes.name: John Owen

quotes.message: Some temptations come to the industrious, but all temptations attack the idle.
quotes.name: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.message: Temptation wrings integrity even as the thumbscrew twists a man's fingers.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.message: Good habits result from resisting temptation.
quotes.name: Ancient Proverb

quotes.message: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: It is easier to stay out than get out.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Temptations, unlike opportunities, will always give you many second chances.
quotes.name: Orlando A. Battista

quotes.message: The force of the blow depends on the resistance. It is sometimes better not to struggle against temptation. Either fly or yield at once.
quotes.name: Francis H. Bradley

quotes.message: We usually know what we can do, but temptation shows us who we are.
quotes.name: Thomas Kempis

quotes.message: Remove the temptation of idleness and cupids bow is useless.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself, and apply myself to them, if they will not apply themselves to me.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Everyone must choose one of two pains: The pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: If we resist our passions, it is more because of their weakness than because of our strength.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: For every man there exists a bait which he cannot resist swallowing.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Conscience whispers, but interest screams aloud.
quotes.name: J. Petit-Senn

quotes.message: Nothing makes it easier to resist temptation than a proper bringing-up, a sound set of values and witnesses.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.message: Temptation usually comes in through a door that has deliberately been left open.
quotes.name: Arnold Glasow

quotes.message: Temptations are a file which rub off much of the rust of our self-confidence.
quotes.name: Francois Fenelon

quotes.message: He who chooses the beginning of the road chooses the place it leads to. It is the means that determines the end.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: Do not grudge the Hand that is moulding the still too shapeless image within you. It is growing more beautiful, though you see it not, and every touch of temptation may add to its perfection.
quotes.name: Henry Drummond

quotes.message: The higher the hill, the stronger the wind: so the loftier the life, the stronger the enemy's temptations.
quotes.name: John Wycliffe

quotes.message: The only way to avoid cannon-shot is to fall down. No such way to be freed from temptation as to keep low.
quotes.name: Thomas Brooks
